sentences.sContent: It will save you from nasty surprises and you will be financially, mentally and legally prepared to save your business from unfavorable consequences of cloud computing.
sentences.sContent_eng: It will save you from nasty surprises and you will be financially, mentally and legally prepared to save your business from unfavorable consequences of cloud computing.
sentences.sCn: 这样才不至于出现意想不到的不愉快，你要准备好从而避免在财务上、精神上和法律上承担云计算的不利后果。

sentences.sContent: Despite their desire to be more market-oriented, many of the rural banks may come under pressure from local officials to make loans on unfavorable terms, pushing up their NPLs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Despite their desire to be more market-oriented, many of the rural banks may come under pressure from local officials to make loans on unfavorable terms, pushing up their NPLs.
sentences.sCn: 尽管有加强市场导向的期望,但是多数农村银行或受到当地政府的压力,以不利的合同条款发放贷款,从而推高不良贷款.

synos.tran: 不宜的；令人不快的；不顺利的

remMethod.val: un (不) + favorable (有利的， 讨人喜欢的) → 不顺利的； 令人不快的

trans.tranCn: 不宜的；令人不快的；不顺利的
